pre_caption: The video begins with a wide shot, capturing a boy in the middle ground, right of center, as he runs up a grassy hill. A prominent tree trunk occupies the foreground on the left, while other trees are positioned in the middle ground. In the background to the left, a flatter landscape is visible. The camera, positioned at the boy's level, tracks him as he moves from left to right. It then pushes in, transitioning to a medium close-up that centers his upper body and face, causing the foreground and background to blur with the motion. Finally, the camera pulls back to a full shot, showing the boy continuing his run toward the right side of the frame, with the sloped, grassy terrain filling the foreground and middle ground.
